aethel_pokedex_batch_11.name: Aquilon
aethel_pokedex_batch_11.concept: A massive, armored creature that protects the seas, inspired by the Glacier Forge myth of the Tlingit.

signature_moves.name: Glacier Forge
signature_moves.description: Aquilon uses its body to create a powerful gust of wind and ice shards that deals massive damage to all opponents. This move has a high chance of causing a freeze.

signature_moves.name: Stone Torrent
signature_moves.description: Aquilon summons a massive wave of water and jagged rocks that crashes down on the opponent. It has a high chance of causing the opponent to flinch and can cause a sandstorm.

aethel_pokedex_batch_11.name: Terrin
aethel_pokedex_batch_11.concept: A massive, ancient creature that protects the earth, inspired by the 'Shifting Earth' myth of the Athabaskan.

signature_moves.name: Earthen Stomp
signature_moves.description: Terrin stomps its feet, causing a powerful earthquake that deals massive damage to all opponents and has a high chance of causing them to flinch.

signature_moves.name: Mountain's Call
signature_moves.description: Terrin roars, raising its Attack and Defense stats and granting a large stat boost to all allied Pokémon on the field.

aethel_pokedex_batch_11.name: Aurabeast
aethel_pokedex_batch_11.concept: A massive, spiritual bear that can control the weather and is connected to the aurora borealis, inspired by the 'Star-Born Bear' myth of the Yup'ik.

signature_moves.name: Aurora Borealis
signature_moves.description: Aurabeast summons a massive aurora that deals massive damage to all opponents, with a high chance of causing a burn or a flinch.

signature_moves.name: Spiritual Shard
signature_moves.description: Aurabeast hurls a bolt of spiritual energy that deals massive damage to a single opponent with a high chance of a critical hit and causing paralysis.

aethel_pokedex_batch_11.name: Mischievian
aethel_pokedex_batch_11.concept: The trickster god of the Aethel region.

signature_moves.name: Psychic Gambit
signature_moves.description: Mischievian creates a psychic vortex that swaps all of its status conditions with its opponent.

signature_moves.name: Trickster's Blade
signature_moves.description: Mischievian creates a blade of pure darkness that deals damage and has a high chance to steal the opponent's signature move.

aethel_pokedex_batch_11.name: Fimbulstorm
aethel_pokedex_batch_11.concept: The great ice that covered the earth, a primordial force of stasis and cold.

signature_moves.name: Permafrost Prison
signature_moves.description: Fimbulstorm generates a sphere of pure cold that encases all Pokémon on the battlefield, dealing damage and freezing them permanently.

aethel_pokedex_batch_11.name: Yggdrys
aethel_pokedex_batch_11.concept: The great tree that held the heavens, a primordial force of nature and growth.

signature_moves.name: World-Root Anchor
signature_moves.description: Yggdrys slams its roots into the earth, causing an earthquake that uproots all non-Grass type Pokémon, rendering them immobile.

signature_moves.name: Dormant Heart
signature_moves.description: The user draws its life energy inward, deactivating its Arboreal Genesis ability for 5 rounds. While the ability is suppressed, the user's Defense and Special Defense are increased by 2; this effect goes away if Life Surge is used.

signature_moves.name: Life Surge
signature_moves.description: The user unleashes a wave of pure life energy, reactivating its Arboreal Genesis ability. The user's Vitality and Insight are raised by 1 unless/until Dormant Heart is used. This move fails if the ability is already active.
